albhed: Drao yna dra cysa eh taydr.
english: They are the same in death.

albhed: Now, how to drag it up?
english: Now, how to drag it up?

albhed: Y myto summoner! Fa sicd nabund.
english: A lady summoner! We must report.

albhed: E tu hud ghuf y drehk! E cfayn du oui!
english: I do not know a thing! I swear to you!

albhed: Uin machina femm bnuja dryd Yevon'c daylrehkc yna hud dra fyo.
english: Our machina will prove that Yevon's teachings are not the way.

albhed: Y summoner... E crymm nabund drec mydan.
english: A summoner... I shall report this later.

albhed: Paehk ynuiht Yevon'c vummufanc sygac celg.
english: Being around Yevon's followers makes sick.

albhed: Rikku! Tuh'd ehdanvana un oui kad drec!
english: Rikku! Don't interfere or you get this!

albhed: Ouin bnaleuic magic yht aeons yna caymat! Kad dras!
english: Your precious magic and aeons are sealed! Get them!

albhed: E ys dra guardian uv Yuna, oui caa?
english: I am the guardian of Yuna, you see?

albhed: Yuna ec cyva! Fa femm kiynt ran! Cra ec cyva!
english: Yuna is safe! We will guard her! She is safe!

albhed: Mucd so kyhk. Rana oui ku.
english: Lost my gang. Here you go.

albhed: ec drao lyh pa piemd yhaf, oui caa?
english: is they can be built anew, you see?

albhed: Vmoehk ec naymmo hud so vunda!
english: Flying is really not my forte!

albhed: Dra Al Bhed Psyches ymm aclybat ryns.
english: The Al Bhed Psyches all escaped harm.

albhed: Fa yna nayto du bmyo ykyeh!
english: We are ready to play again!

albhed: Fa haat blitz du lraan uin baobma
english: We need blitz to cheer our people

albhed: yrdam dra mucc ur Home, oui caa?
english: after the loss of Home, you see?

albhed: Vunkeja sa vun so yldeuhc eh Luca
english: Forgive me for my actions in Luca

albhed: Fa fyhdat du bnudald dra summoner, oui caa?
english: We wanted to protect the summoner, you see?

albhed: so fnydr eh dra blitz cbrana!
english: my wrath in the blitz sphere!

albhed: Buun lremt, ra tuac hud ihtancdyht
english: Poor child, he does not understand

albhed: dryd uin Home ec hu suna
english: that our Home is no more

albhed: Ajah fedruid uin Home, fa sicd
english: Even without our Home, we must

albhed: meja uh! E uhmo ruba E ys ypma.
english: live on! I only hope I am able.

albhed: Lrycat po fiend! Fa yna ymm
english: Chased by fiend! We are all

albhed: E red so rayt frah dra creb cruug.
english: I hit my head when the ship shook.

albhed: Hu desa vun daync yht cruidehk!
english: No time for tears and shouting!

albhed: Ymm fa sicd tu ec napiemt uin Home!
english: All we must do is rebuild our Home!

albhed: Ouin vyla, E ryja caah ed pavuna.
english: Your face, I have seen it before.

albhed: Banrybc eh dra dasbma yd Baaj?
english: Perhaps in the temple at Baaj?

albhed: Fryd femm E tu? So tumm!
english: What will I do? My doll!

albhed: Pid fa cyo muca cusadrehk bnaleuic,
english: But we say lose something precious,

albhed: Ed ec utt du vmo eh y creb
english: It is odd to fly in a ship

albhed: Ed ec y pyddma sucd tyhkanuic.
english: It is a battle most dangerous.

albhed: pid E vayn funca ec lusehk.
english: but I fear worse is coming.

albhed: E sicd dnyeh un dra airship
english: I must train or the airship

albhed: femm nup sa uv so siclmac!
english: will rob me of my muscles!

albhed: Yevon vuiht dra bmyla uv uin Home
english: Yevon found the place of our Home

albhed: E muhk vun dra cyhtc uv Bikanel.
english: I long for the sands of Bikanel.

albhed: Tacand ed syo pa, pid drana
english: Desert it may be, but there

albhed: Pid E cyf res eh Luca.
english: But I saw him in Luca.

albhed: Drah oui yna uha fedr dra Al Bhed!
english: Then you are one with the Al Bhed!

albhed: Fa mavd getc uh dra knuiht.
english: We left kids on the ground.

albhed: Draca drehkc rana pamuhk du Secdan Rin,
english: These things here belong to Mister Rin,

albhed: Drao yna hud ouinc du dyga!
english: They are not yours to take!

albhed: Fa tuh'd ghuf ruf Sin femm nayld.
english: We don't know how Sin will react.

albhed: E vehymmo ryja vekinat uid ruf
english: I finally have figured out how

albhed: ed ec dryd drec creb ec sujat.
english: it is that this ship is moved.

albhed: Fedr drec creb, najahka ykyehcd dra
english: With this ship, revenge against the

albhed: vummufanc uv Yevon femm pa uinc.
english: followers of Yevon will be ours.

albhed: Dra Sin E cyf eh dra niehc
english: The Sin I saw in the ruins

albhed: Cu ev oui fyhd y bmyh
english: So if you want a plan

albhed: E ryja du vmo dra airship huf.
english: I have to fly the airship now.

albhed: E fyhd du pa y dub bmyoan,
english: I want to be a top player,

albhed: syho daysc E fyhd du dno.
english: many teams I want to try.

albhed: Dra yka uv dra dasbmac ec bycd,
english: The age of the temples is past,

albhed: Huf lusac dra yka uv machina!
english: Now comes the age of machina!

albhed: So vneaht, ra fahd du Baaj du
english: My friend, he went to Baaj to

albhed: Eh dra tacandat dasbma drana, vyehdmo
english: In the deserted temple there, faintly

albhed: dra Rosh uv dra Vyodr lyh pa raynt!
english: the Hymn of the Fayth can be heard!

albhed: Syopa ed ryc cusadrehk du tu
english: Maybe it has something to do

albhed: Eh yhleahd desac y dasbma fyc eh Baaj.
english: In ancient times a temple was in Baaj.

albhed: Huf ed ec y hacd vun fiend uhmo.
english: Now it is a nest for fiend only.

albhed: eh dra tacandat dasbma, drao cyo.
english: in the deserted temple, they say.

albhed: Pid y knayd fiend mejac drana duu,
english: But a great fiend lives there too,

albhed: Pid E cyf res eh Luca.
english: But I saw him in Luca.

albhed: Pudr, Yunalesca yht Mika fana tayt,
english: Both, Yunalesca and Mika were dead,

albhed: oad drao lmihk du Spira dekrdmo.
english: yet they clung to Spira tightly.

albhed: Paehk uh creb ec pyt vun raymdr.
english: Being on ship is bad for health.

albhed: E ys kmyt oui syta ed pylg vnus Bevelle.
english: I am glad you made it back from Bevelle.

albhed: Drao teth'd famlusa ic mycd desa.
english: They didn't welcome us last time.

albhed: Ev oui yna bnabynat, fa lyh
english: If you are prepared, we can

albhed: E femm pa cehkehk duu, oac!
english: I will be singing too, yes!

albhed: Syho uv uin vneahtc teat eh dra yddylg
english: Many of our friends died in the attack

albhed: uh Home. Hajan femm E vunkeja dra dasbmac.
english: on Home. Never will I forgive the temples.

albhed: Femm dra baubma uv Spira mecdah
english: Will the people of Spira listen

albhed: du dra lymm yht cehk vun ic?
english: to the call and sing for us?

albhed: Vydran! E ghuf fryd du ica!
english: Father! I know what to use!

albhed: Oui femm vekrd Sin ymuha, hu?
english: You will fight Sin alone, no?

albhed: Syga cina du lralg ouin axiebsahd
english: Make sure to check your equipment

albhed: Mayja dra creb du so ryhtc!
english: Leave the ship to my hands!

albhed: Oui ku huf du dra talg!
english: You go now to the deck!

albhed: Yht fedr Sin yd dra lahdna!
english: And with Sin at the centre!

albhed: Tu oui ryja ymm dryd oui haat?
english: Do you have all that you need?

albhed: E tu hud nih ynuiht eh byhel!
english: I do not run around in panic!

albhed: Ruba vun dra pacd, bnabyna vun dra funcd!
english: Hope for the best, prepare for the worst!

albhed: Cuuh ec dra vehym pyddma fedr Sin!
english: Soon is the final battle with Sin!

albhed: Byntuh sa. Cu clynat fyc E dryd
english: Pardon me. So scared was I that

albhed: E pakyh du dnaspma ymm ujan!
english: I began to tremble all over!

albhed: Ev ajano suidr eh Spira cehkc,
english: If every mouth in Spira sings,

albhed: E sicd maynh du pa mega res.
english: I must learn to be like him.

albhed: E ryja vyedr oui femm tu drec drehk,
english: I have faith you will do this thing,

albhed: E femm cehk, duu, vun E pameaja.
english: I will sing, too, for I believe.

albhed: Pid dra syeh kih, ed ec pnugah!
english: But the main gun, it is broken!

albhed: E lyhhud pameaja fryd E caa!
english: I cannot believe what I see!

albhed: E ghuf ed femm hud tu du byhel,
english: I know it will not do to panic,

albhed: pid E tu hud ghuf ruf du pa lyms!
english: but I do not know how to be calm!

albhed: Frah dra desa lusac, E femm vekrd,
english: When the time comes, I will fight,

albhed: fa femm bmyo blitz uhla suna!
english: we will play blitz once more!

albhed: Oui femm yddylg Sin rayt uh?
english: You will attack Sin head on?

albhed: Dnimo y knayd fynneun yna oui!
english: Truly a great warrior are you!

albhed: Ed femm pa y pyddma sucd jeumahd!
english: It will be a battle most violent!

albhed: Lralg dryd oui ryja ymm oui haat!
english: Check that you have all you need!

albhed: Ed ec y lnywo, pid tamekrdvim bmyh!
english: It is a crazy, but delightful plan!

albhed: Uin creb ec eh dub cryba!
english: Our ship is in top shape!

albhed: Huf, ku yht vamm dra knayd Sin!
english: Now, go and fell the great Sin!

albhed: Fa femm lrynka ehdu Sin, hu?
english: We will charge into Sin, no?

albhed: Oui ku uhdu Sin uhla suna, ar?
english: You go onto Sin once more, eh?

albhed: So vneaht, ra fahd du Pyyz du
english: My friend, he went to Baaj to

albhed: Eh dra tacandat dasbma drana, vyehdmo
english: In the deserted temple there, faintly

albhed: dra Rosh uv dra Vyodr lyh pa raynt!
english: the Hymn of the Fayth can be heard!

albhed: Syopa ed ryc cusadrehk du tu
english: Maybe it has something to do

albhed: Eh yhleahd desac y dasbma fyc eh Baaj.
english: In ancient times a temple was in Baaj.

albhed: Huf ed ec y hacd vun fiend uhmo.
english: Now it is a nest for fiend only.

albhed: eh dra tacandat dasbma, drao cyo.
english: in the deserted temple, they say.

albhed: Pid y knayd fiend mejac drana duu,
english: But a great fiend lives there too,

albhed: Hajan ryja E druikrd uv vmoehk
english: Never have I thought of flying

albhed: ehdu Sin! Hud ajah eh tnaysc!
english: into Sin! Not even in dreams!

albhed: E cyhk eh vnekrd yht fuimt hud cdub!
english: I sang in fright and would not stop!

albhed: Frah dra Lyms lusac, fa femm bmyo
english: When the Calm comes, we will play

albhed: aylr tyo! Huf fa sicd dnyeh, dnyeh!
english: each day! Now we must train, train!

albhed: Ymm dryd ec rana ec yd ouin
english: All that is here is at your

albhed: Sin cedc cdemm. Ed sujac hud.
english: Sin sits still. It moves not.

albhed: Ed caasc du fyed vun ic.
english: It seems to wait for us.

albhed: Ev uhmo dra syeh kih fungat,
english: If only the main gun worked,
